name: The Dead Hallway
description:
Description:

In The Dead Hallway, you find yourself trapped in an old and decrepit hallway, with no memory of how you got there. It quickly becomes clear that you're not alone, and that something sinister is lurking in the darkness.

Your only goal is to escape the building alive but to do so, you'll have to navigate through a seemingly endless corridor, avoiding the creatures that are chasing you. With each step you take, the tension mounts as the enemies are approaching faster and faster.

Features and FunFacts:
  • One-button horror experience
  • LowPoly-Retro aesthetics
  • Atmospheric environment
  • Made in just 48 hours for a game jam.
Controls:
  • Press W to RUN.
